channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The blogger who helped spark Nvidia’s $600 billion stock collapse
It’s not just forgetfulness: 8 early warning signs of dementia
item.description: Nightmares and changes in vision can both be early warning signs of dementia.

item.title: S&P 500 books weekly loss as U.S. stocks fall on Trump’s Feb. 1 tariffs
Some FAA systems are a half-century old, as aging tech suffers from lack of replacement parts and support service
item.description: A 2024 GAO report found that 37% of the FAA's 138 air traffic control systems were deemed unsustainable.

item.title: Stocks’ gains in January are usually a good sign. New tariffs could change that.
Trump set to launch world trade war, investors to pay the ‘chaos premium'.
Trump slaps tariffs on top US trade partners—with risk of hikes if there’s retaliation—and there will be no exemptions
item.description: The tariffs will go into effect on Tuesday.

item.title: An ‘aerial version of Moore’s Law’ has dramatically improved safety, but an aviation expert notes this disturbing trend
item.description: From 2018 to 2022, the risk of a fatality from commercial air travel was 1 per 13.7 million passenger boardings versus 1 per 7.9 million from 2008 to ...

item.title: Trump launches trade war on Canada, Mexico, China, investors to pay premium
Elon Musk’s DOGE gains access to sensitive Treasury data, including Social Security and Medicare payment systems
item.description: The move by DOGE means it could have wide leeway to access important taxpayer data, among other things.
